trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="Base64" /> decoding transform as defined in Section 6.6.2 of the XMLDSIG specification.
trans-unit.target: Representa a transformação de decodificação <see langword="Base64" /> conforme definida na seção 6.6.2 da especificação de XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object when you need to sign the raw data associated with the encoded content of an element.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> quando você precisa assinar os dados brutos associados ao conteúdo codificado de um elemento do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigBase64TransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: O URI Uniform Resource Identifier () que descreve o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> objeto é definido pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigBase64TransformUrl> campo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Base64` decoding transform, see Section 6.6.2 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `Base64` decodificação de transformação, consulte a seção 6.6.2 da especificação XMLDSIG, que está disponível a partir do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar membros de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" />.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação XML dos parâmetros do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> adequados para serem incluídos como subelementos de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de nós XML que representa o conteúdo específico da transformação necessário para descrever o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual em um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto retornado deve ser <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar a saída do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> objeto.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> classe.

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de saída a ser retornada.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> é o único tipo válido para esse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual do tipo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual do tipo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto retornado deve ser <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar a saída do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> objeto.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="type" /> não é um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são entradas válidas para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de entrada válidas para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> objeto; você pode passar apenas os objetos de um desses tipos para o <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> método atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de entrada válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> são <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade para recuperar os tipos de entrada válidos para a transformação atual.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> a ser carregado no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element; this method is not supported because the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object has no inner XML elements.
trans-unit.target: Analisa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> especificado como conteúdo específico da transformação de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" />; este método não tem suporte porque o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> não tem nenhum elemento XML interno.

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported because the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object has no inner XML elements.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não tem suporte porque o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> objeto não tem nenhum elemento XML interno.

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A entrada a ser carregada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Carrega a entrada especificada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto de entrada deve ser um dos tipos de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput%2A> method using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object as the input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput%2A> método usando especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> objeto como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="obj" /> parameter is a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and it is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="obj" /> é um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> e é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são possíveis saídas provenientes de métodos <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de saída válido para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> objeto; somente os objetos de um desses tipos são retornados do <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput" /> métodos do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream> é o tipo de saída só é válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> objeto.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.OutputTypes%2A> propriedade para recuperar os tipos de saída válido para a transformação atual.
